_sText: MG SPECIAL DELIVERY BY UNREAL Counter-terrorists have to destroy all terrorists inside the crates within 2 minutes. Terrorists must try to escape, until the game ends. [ NEW VERSION ] 100% Compatible with OB update CHANGES (version 7): [+] No more hard spots; [+] Fixed scout drop, that would make possible for CTs to have their scout when the game is over [+] Fixed chat spam [+] Fixed bug that would only give weapons to one terrorists in the end [+] Fixed weird bug that caused server to crash when picking a crate in the end [+] Removed all knives/crates on game end [+] Unlimited health for counter-terrorists during the game, terrorists can still pickup scouts but can't kill counter-terrorists. [+] Added more detail [+] Added instructions on counter-terrorists spawn [+] Added more spawnpoints (24 terrorists / 18 counter-terrorists) [+] Adapted to SourceMod I hope you like this new version, its WAY MORE STABLE, and no bugs were found untill now.
